name: TheHighscore #2
description:
This is a small 2D platformer with a bunch of extra features. Like.....

Theme : Presicion

My game ties into presicion becuase of its bullets always flying in a straight line and you having to jump with presicion in the parkour level (Unlocks with highscore of 1000 or more)

Modes :

Pick from a bunch of modes to play and have fun.

Maps :

Unlock and enjoy all the maps in this game by juts playing.

Achievements :

Play the game to earn achievements to show of.

Enemies :

Enjoy all the enemies this game has to other like...

The Normo : Red and slow basic enemy

The Green Dude : Small, fast and flying, WATCH OUT!

The Lava Bruh : Fast and jumps out the lava when u least expect it

PowerUps :

The PowerUps look very weird at the moment,  but there are 3 right now with just square art except the ammo pickup. 

Controls :

W A S D - All movement including jumping

Mouse - Looking around

LMB - Shoot

Escape - Pause

This game is a semi follow up of TheHighscore witch is the first game I made. Hope you enjoy this small game i made and check out my other games (be warned cringe). 

Thx to Cynical_Karma for providing the music for this game.
